body_html: I am still having a problem with spectral norm complaining about in place changes when followed by batch normalization and distributed across 2 or more GPUs using data parallel. This architecture arises in Big GAN (https://arxiv.org/abs/1809.11096). Interestingly this is not an issue with group normalization, instance normalization, or no normalization. It is also not an issue on a single GPU.
